comments:
After an unclean closing of Eclipse, I am unable to run my PDE launch configurations, or even bring 
up the launch configuration editor. The following error is logged:

This seems to be an issue with plugins that have classpath issues, or that are out of sync. I 
manually removed the offending launch config and created a new one. Under the 'Tracing' tab, the 
plugin tree showed a sync error on one of the plugins. This disabled the apply and run buttons, but 
no error message was reported on the dialog. This erroneous condition should be reported to the 
user.
PDE's launcher handles previous unclean exits more gracefully now.
